con:config.script: log.info " >>>>>>>>>>>>>> start" testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("TestDataFileLocation","abc") log.info " >>>>>>>>>>>>>> end"

con:eventHandlers.name: TestSuiteRunListener.beforeTestCase
con:eventHandlers.con:script:
//Test Script
log.info "Run this before every Test Case"

con:eventHandlers.name: ProjectRunListener.beforeRun
con:eventHandlers.con:script: log.info "Running in Project Level" def ProjName = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.name log.info ProjName

con:eventHandlers.name: SubmitListener.beforeSubmit
con:eventHandlers.con:script: log.info "Running Event Handler Before Reqeust..." log.info " Proj Name is :- "+testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.name log.info " The Name of Proj is : " +testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.name log.info " The step name is : " +context.getCurrentStep().getLabel()

con:eventHandlers.name: TestSuiteRunListener.beforeTestCase
con:eventHandlers.con:script: log.info " Proj Name is :- "+testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.name log.info " The Name of Proj is : " +testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.name log.info " The step name is : " +context.getCurrentStep().getLabel()
